titleStmt.title: By the Quene The Quenes Maiestie vnderstandyng, that where of late the peece of gold called the pistolet was made currant at fiue shyllynges [and] tenne pence, and not aboue ...
Proclamations. 1560-11-02
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles chvrchyarde, by Rychard Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: At foot of page: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.

Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
